name: iDidYourDigitalAvatar
0:
”Alexa, ask my Avatar to locate Harry”
”Alexa, ask my Avatar to turn the kitchen light on when I come home”
”Alexa, ask my Avatar to remind Sally to pick up dry cleaning on her way home”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my avatar
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Alexa to issue contextually smart commands. The invocation name is "my avatar". Examples:

You: Alexa, ask my avatar to locate Tom
Alexa: Tom is near Kroger at Argyle

You: Alexa, ask my avatar to remind me to let the cat out when I wake up
Alexa: Sleep reminder successfully set. (You will be notified to let the cat out when you wake up).

You: Alexa, ask my avatar to turn the fireplace off when I leave.
Alexa: An exit action has been created for place, "home" with action, automations set: Turn off fireplace". (Your fireplace is turned off when you leave).

Contextual Intelligence for this skill is provided by the iDid app. Download the iDid app from Google Play. Alexa interface is available on Android only at this time.

The iDid app learns from you and knows your context so it acts and responds with contextual intelligence. For example if you say, "Remind me to stop at Kroger when I leave work", it is able to recognize that event and remind you at the right time. 

iDid is a family application. You can share your location with friends and family, so collective commands can be issued. For instance, you can say, "Alexa, ask my avatar to remind Rita to get gas when she leaves Costco". Her iDid app will remind her at the right time.

Thank you and for more information see http://idid-inc.com
